      • contentPane

        private javax.swing.JPanel contentPane
        The contents of the window are placed in this JPanel

      • selectedColorLabel

        private javax.swing.JLabel selectedColorLabel
        This label is displayed at the bottom of the window with a black background and shows the text 'COLOR'. The foreground of the text indicates the selected colour

      • whiteButton

        private javax.swing.JTextField whiteButton
        This is displayed as a white rectangle on the screen. When clicked, the selected colour is changed to white.

      • yellowButton

        private javax.swing.JTextField yellowButton
        This is displayed as a yellow rectangle on the screen. When clicked, the selected colour is changed to yellow.

      • redButton

        private javax.swing.JTextField redButton
        This is displayed as a red rectangle on the screen. When clicked, the selected colour is changed to red.

        private javax.swing.JTextField blueButton
